t: How ethical is Amazon.com Inc? | Ethical Consumer
s: March 18, 2025 - Amazon is known for its shameless tax avoidance, workers’ rights abuses, environmental impacts and much more. The company has been the subject of an Ethical Consumer global boycott call since 2012. We’ve summarised the key ethical issues to consider when it comes to Amazon.
